<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:cc30070fdbce68101407c7ec0b961971</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Manage Team: On request tpe</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
   var request_type = g_form.getValue('request_type');
   if (request_type == 'create') {
		g_form.setVisible('ansible_tower_team', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('ansible_tower_use_case', false);
		g_form.clearValue('team_name');
		g_form.clearValue('team_description');
		g_form.clearValue('deploy_to_all_environments_or_specific');
		g_form.clearValue('deploy_devtest');
		g_form.clearValue('deploy_devtest');
		g_form.clearValue('deploy_dev');
		g_form.clearValue('deploy_uat');
		g_form.clearValue('deploy_prod');
		//g_form.clearValue('team_id');
		g_form.setReadOnly('ansible_tower_team', false);
		g_form.setReadOnly('team_id',true);
		g_form.setVisible('ansible_tower_team_lookup', false);
   } 
   if (request_type == 'modify') {
		g_form.setVisible('ansible_tower_team_lookup', true);
		g_form.setVisible('ansible_tower_team', false);
		g_form.setVisible('ansible_tower_team_role_mrvs', false);
   } 
	if (request_type == 'delete') {
		g_form.setVisible('ansible_tower_team_lookup', true);
		g_form.setVisible('ansible_tower_team', false);
		g_form.setVisible('ansible_tower_team_role_mrvs', false);

   } 
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>e663988</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-04 16:47:40</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>86e09f731beea098470611f8bc4bcbc7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Manage Team: On request tpe</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower" source="x_ibmss_gts_oar_at">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_86e09f731beea098470611f8bc4bcbc7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>e663988</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-04 16:47:40</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
